Title: Create an Enviornment

At least 2-3 low-fidelity wireframes of the most important features
As a user, I want interactive activities that let me experiment with AI tools so that I can learn through hands-on experience.
As a user, I want to have real-time feedback on my checks for understanding, so that I can alter my approach as I go.
As a user, I want to understand how AI works, so I can better gauge the accuracy of claims about AI.
As a user, I want to see cited sources, so I can verify and trust what I've learned.
As a user, I want learning materials to be as concise as possible, so that I’m not wasting time I could be using to do other things.
As a user, I want to learn about the sustainability of AI, so I can know how much to limit my reliance.
As a user, I want to visualize how AI “thinks” so that I can better understand what is going on when I submit a prompt.
As a user, I want to learn about the weaknesses of AI so I can avoid using it in those situations.
As a user, I want to be more informed on the ethical considerations, so I can use the tool responsibly and in an informed manner.
As a user, I want instructions on how to design effective prompts, so that I can use AI tools more effectively and get better results.
As a user, I want to explore real-world examples of AI applications to see how AI is utilized across various industries.
As a user, I want a clear overview of the benefits of AI literacy when I first open the app, so that I understand why investing my time in learning about AI is valuable.
As a user, I want to understand the legal implications of using these tools to ensure I am complying with legal standards and recommendations.
As a user, I want to discover how AI affects privacy and data security so that I can make informed choices about sharing information.
As a user, I want to learn how bias in training data affects what I see when I use AI, so that I can be cognizant of whether or not AI generated content is reinforcing my own biases.
As a user, I want to learn what happens to my ownership over my materials that I upload to an AI generator once I hit “generate”, so that I can make informed choices about what I upload.
As a user, I want a learning experience that can load even when I’m in an area with bad internet so that my learning isn’t hindered by unnecessary frustration.
As a user, I want to compare traditional problem-solving methods with AI-driven ones so that I can understand AI’s unique advantages and potential downsides.
Duplicate: As a user, I want to learn about the weaknesses of AI so I can avoid using it in those situations.
